https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2qbgaZothXrCMohpY7CzsMcZeMo.jpg Cold Moon takes place in tiny Babylon, Fla., where the granddaughter of Clark’s character is murdered by a mysterious assailant, her body sunk into the black waters of the Styx River — the river where her parents disappeared from their boat a decade earlier. Suspicion falls on a duplicitous banker and his wealthy father, played by Stewart and Lloyd. Cold Moon
